item.title: The Hong Kong government confirms the schedule for releasing statistics from March to May
item.description:
Companies interested in monitoring the Hong Kong economy can stay informed through press release schedules published by the Hong Kong government. These releases provide insights into various economic indicators. A schedule of upcoming releases for March to May 2014 is provided below, starting with March 3rd. March 2014 3rd: January 2014 Retail Sales Statistics 7th: Fourth Quarter 2013 Statistics on Vessels, Port Cargo, and Containers 10th: Fourth Quarter 2013 Quarterly Business Receipts Indices for Service Industries..
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/the-hong-kong-government-confirms-the-schedule-for-releasing-statistics-from-march-to-may/

item.title: March and April dining promotions are being shared by Grand Mercure Singapore Roxy
item.description:
Source: Grand Mercure Singapore Roxy. Braised beancurd, with salted egg in the background. The Grand Mercure Singapore Roxy is offering several dining deals throughout March and April 2016. One promotion focuses on Teochew porridge with side dishes created by Head Chef Victor Lee Appu at the Jia Wei Chinese Restaurant. Teochew porridge, a classic dish from Eastern Guangdong, China, is a staple for the Teochew people. Unlike Cantonese congee, the Singaporean version is prepared without broth and served with a variety of accompanying dishes and condiments...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/march-and-april-dining-promotions-are-being-shared-by-grand-mercure-singapore-roxy/
